SELECT u.user_id as userId, u.role_id as roleId, u.department_id as departmentId, u.user_name as userName, u.user_image as userImage, u.emp_num as empNum, u.user_password as userPassword, u.telephone, u.email, u.status, u.ct_time as ctTime, u.up_time as upTime, u.birthday_num as birthdayNum, u.time_in as timeIn, u.deleted, r.role_name as roleName, d.depart_name as departmentName FROM user u LEFT JOIN role r ON u.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN depart d ON u.department_id = d.depart_id
AND u.user_id = #{userId}
AND r.role_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{roleName}, '%')
AND u.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userName}, '%')
AND u.emp_num LIKE CONCAT('%', #{empNum}, '%')
AND u.telephone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{telephone}, '%')
AND u.email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{email}, '%')
AND u.status = #{status}
AND u.time_in = #{timeIn}
AND d.depart_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{departName}, '%')
AND u.deleted=0
order by u.time_in desc
